meanings.definition: To shout or call loudly to someone.
meanings.sent1: I holloa to my friend across the playground.
meanings.sent2: She holloas for help when she sees a spider.
meanings.sent3: The teacher holloas for quiet in the classroom.
meanings.sent4: The coach holloas instructions to the players on the field.
meanings.sent5: The hiker holloas for assistance when she gets lost in the woods.

meanings.definition: A loud shout or call to attract attention.
meanings.sent1: The holloa of the lifeguard alerted everyone to the danger.
meanings.sent2: His holloa echoed through the valley, reaching far and wide.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected holloa from the audience surprised the performers.
meanings.sent4: The holloa of the referee signaled the end of the match.
meanings.sent5: The holloa of the auctioneer filled the room, capturing everyone's focus.
